Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:

MySTL.h [code]Customized STL functions
NFWFit.h [code]Fit of a Navarro-Frenk-White potential
OctTree.h [code]Build octal tree
PoissonSolver.h [code]Functions to solve the Poisson problem for rho
ReadGadget.c [code]Sample input file from Gadget2, modified for use with AMATEUR
ReadGadget.h [code]All publicly known functions from ReadGadget.c and template instantiations
SubhaloMatch.cpp [code]This file provides a wrapper to convert mtree_idx files generated by an autocorrelation run of AMIGA to give the host halo
SubhaloMatch.h [code]All publicly known functions of SubhaloMatch.cpp
SystemCharacteristics.cpp [code]Implementation of all system-wide properties that all parts of the program should know
